sentence.Network_en: The frog boasted to the turtle about the wideness and fineness of the well.
sentence.Network_cn: 青蛙非常得意地对它谈起井底的世界是多么宽敞和美好,并且请海龟到井中来做客.

sentence.Network_en: All of its greatness, wideness , massiness and depth are alike with you very much.
sentence.Network_cn: 海的博大, 海的深广, 海的厚重,海的深沉,都像极了你.

sentence.Network_en: Because focusing more on wideness but depth of the market , new arrivals appear to be frequent.
sentence.Network_cn: 更看重产品的广度而不是深度, 因此新货上市非常的频繁.
